question: Shakila, who passed away recently, was the famous personality from which field?
explanation: Yesteryear Bollywood actress Shakila (82), who was known for her work in films like \"Aar Paar\" and \"CID\", has passed away in Mumbai, Maharashtra on September 20, 2017. She was a star in her own right in the 50\'s n 60\'s. The famous song ‘Baabuji dhiire chalanaa…’ from Aar Paar was filmed on her. Besides her roles in Guru Dutt classics like \'Aar Paar\' and \'CID\', Shakila also starred with Shammi Kapoor in Shakti Samanta\'s hit \'China Town\'.
